BR_text.BRdescription:
<denchmark-h:h3>What is the problem?</denchmark-h>
 
 In the documentation it says "on_postprocess_batch" instead of "on_postprocess_traj" in this sentence: "Note that in the on_postprocess_batch callback you have full access to the trajectory batch [...]." (<denchmark-link:https://ray.readthedocs.io/en/latest/rllib-training.html>https://ray.readthedocs.io/en/latest/rllib-training.html</denchmark-link>
 )
 It's just a minor mistake but it seriously threw me off, searching the docs and the code for quite a while for the "on_postprocess_batch" function.
 Ray version and other system information (Python version, TensorFlow version, OS):
 0.7.6
 Does the problem occur on the latest wheels?
 does not apply
 I'd be happy to make a pull request.

comments_0.comment_text: Thanks for reporting this, making a pull request would be really great :)
